data.eml:eml: Contribution to the knowledge on the spider wasps genus Morochares Banks, 1934 (Hymenoptera: Pompilidae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Loktionov, Valery M., Lelej, Arkady S., Liu, Jing-Xian (2018): Contribution to the knowledge on the spider wasps genus Morochares Banks, 1934 (Hymenoptera: Pompilidae) from China. Zootaxa 4462 (4): 497-510, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4462.4.3
